about_the_game:
Shino has been the protagonist's childhood friend since they were kids.

She loves gaming, is skilled at cooking, has a great personality, is busty, and has a cute face.

She is like a symbol of a man's "preferences"...

A girl with such high specs that anyone would take a second glance if they passed her by.

However, everyday life with her doesn't seem to be just peaceful.

This work is an exploration RPG without combat.

In the first half, you have 10 days of free attendance before the summer vacation, with 50 turns in total including morning, noon, evening, night, and late night, freely exploring the city of Suō where the heroine lives and spending ordinary days while collecting flags for route branching.

After the route is confirmed in the latter half, the scene falls deeper. (There is a pure love route)

  • Time management

  • Rich story

  • NTR and pure love

  • 66 scenes + α　10 ENDs

Shino has been the protagonist's childhood friend since they were kids.

She loves gaming, is skilled at cooking, has a great personality, is busty, and has a cute face.

She is like a symbol of a man's "preferences"...

A girl with such high specs that anyone would take a second glance if they passed her by.

However, everyday life with her doesn't seem to be just peaceful.

This work is an exploration RPG without combat.

In the first half, you have 10 days of free attendance before the summer vacation, with 50 turns in total including morning, noon, evening, night, and late night, freely exploring the city of Suō where the heroine lives and spending ordinary days while collecting flags for route branching.

After the route is confirmed in the latter half, the scene falls deeper. (There is a pure love route)

name: FALLEN GF

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
